name: Cave Crawl (cavecrawl)
description:
Cave Crawl is a 2D platformer game where you are a hiker who falls down a hole into a cave to look for your lost friends. You enter a world with magical creatures and monsters to avoid.  Explore the cave, collect keys, and face creatures to unlock new areas.

Credits: Kim Tran (Art/Audio), Zoriana Sand (Art), Emily Caccivio (Code), Sam Glaser (Code)

Game Music by Isaac Monheit
